head.title: Colle & McVoy Wins Best of Show Award

identified-content.object.title: Advertising (Times Column)
identified-content.classifier: Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Marketing, Advertising and PR

hedline.hl1: Colle & McVoy Wins Best of Show Award

abstract.p: Business Marketing Association gives its top Ace Award to Colle & McVoy Marketing Communications; Ogilvy & Mather Worldwide wins four Aces (S)

block.p: Colle & McVoy Marketing Communications in Minneapolis, which is majority owned by the MDC Communications Corporation, has won the Best of Show award at the 30th annual Ace Awards ceremony.

Colle & McVoy won for its work on a print campaign for Vetconnect, a veterinary pharmaceutical company. The most Aces were awarded to Ogilvy & Mather Worldwide in New York, part of the WPP Group, with four, for an e-commerce campaign for I.B.M. The awards, given out on Tuesday, honor business-to-business communications and are sponsored by the Business Marketing Association in New York.
